meanings.definition: A person who is not a customer.
meanings.sent1: The store manager greeted the noncustomer with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The noncustomer decided not to purchase anything today.
meanings.sent3: The noncustomer accidentally walked into the employee-only area and got lost.
meanings.sent4: The noncustomer was like a fish out of water in the busy shopping mall.
meanings.sent5: The noncustomer stood out in the store with their empty hands.

meanings.sent1: The noncustomer inquiry was quickly resolved by the staff.
meanings.sent2: The noncustomer parking spaces were always available near the entrance.
meanings.sent3: The noncustomer discount was a clever marketing strategy.
meanings.sent4: The noncustomer status made the salesperson offer a special deal.
meanings.sent5: The noncustomer section of the store had different products on display.
